title_indoor: Your home will leave a lasting impression on visitors with the help of the Hi Frame line of products.
indoor_desc: Our residential installations will enhance the appearance of your living room, dining room, great room, office space or den when incorporating a Hiframe design. As an entertainment asset, your Hiframe unit quickly becomes a conversation piece for family, friends and clients.

design_desc: Hiframe has created hundreds of design choices. Enjoy the solution of your dreams, and conceal your television to turn your space into a piece of art. Hiframe designs are exceptional choices for both residential and commercial applications.
title_showrooms: Visit our showroom to experience the magic of Hi Frame. You will find the viewing experience to be as fantastic and dramatic as they say it is.
